description: This is a test script using FastAPI's TestClient to test API endpoints related to execution management. It contains sample request creation, API call tests for submitting executions, retrieving execution details, logs, listing and filtering executions, and error handling for not found cases.

methods.name: _sample_request()
methods.description: Creates a sample ExecutionRequest object with preset git source, entrypoint, parameters, environment, and correlation id.

methods.name: test_submit_execution_happy_path(client: TestClient)
methods.description: Tests the successful submission of an execution and verifies response status and content.

methods.name: test_get_execution_detail_and_logs_flow(client: TestClient)
methods.description: Tests retrieval of execution details and logs across multiple pages, verifying status updates, correct execution id, and log pagination handling.

methods.name: test_list_executions_and_filter(client: TestClient)
methods.description: Tests listing all executions and filtering executions by status, verifying response structure and filtering correctness.

methods.name: test_execution_not_found_errors(client: TestClient)
methods.description: Tests API responses for non-existent execution ID endpoints to ensure proper 404 error handling.
